channel.title: VPN on MH Site
channel.description: Recent content in VPN on MH Site

item.title: Wireguard Gateway & Android
item.description: Setup your Linux Server Your Linux server should be accessible via a public IP by UDP. If the IP address changes, use DynDNS. First install WireGuard on your Linux server. On the official website you will find the right way for your Linux distro: WireGuard.com/install Then configure the Gateway. We will use the range 100.64.0.0/10 (RFC 6598) because it doesn’t colide with private IPv4 adresses (RFC 1918). echo '[Interface]' > /etc/wireguard/wg0.
